The LinWaveEqn class provides an implementation that uses SAMRAI classes to solve the 2nd order linear wave eqn (shown below in 1d):

with initial conditions

The class provides interfaces to problem dependent operations that are expected by gridding operations performed in SAMRAI. For example, initializing data on a level and resetting hierarchy after regrid and pre and post process operations performed when transferring data between hierarchy levels. The class also provides an "advance()" method which computes u^(n+1) on hierarchy levels.

Other methods may be added as needed.

Input Parameters:

  • cfl double specifying CFL (k/h = wave freq/dx) for the problem.

A sample input entry might look like:

LinWaveEqn {

cfl = 0.1

}
